The fabric was unfavorable, it had no shape to it and it was heavy.  Like the takes 30 weeks to ship to you type of fabric, not a comfy fit.
Very attractive cut for all figures nice color, not too dark to photograph. Green true color I’ve also ordered the black . The nutmeg color is much lighter than it looks. It’s more of a taupe
Gorgeous fabric, beautiful sweater
Love the number of colors available.  Soft, good fit.  After the first purchase is 2 sweaters, I’ve ordered 3 more and am very pleased with all 5 sweaters. Great value.
I am normally a M, but I bought the S because I did not want it too big.  It was perfect.  The weight of the fabric was surprisingly heavy which helps the sweater fall nicely.
too big, unflattering.
Demasiado grande
The sweater size runs smaller than actual size and the material is not soft , it’s itchy and thin.

This brown sweater is incredibly cozy with its super soft material, making it perfect for chilly days. The cute collar adds a unique touch, giving it a stylish edge that stands out. It’s warm yet lightweight, so it’s comfortable to wear all day. The fit is flattering without being too tight, and it pairs well with both casual and semi-formal outfits. Overall, it’s a versatile wardrobe staple that I find myself reaching for again and again!

评论概述: Unflattering and horrible slits on side
评论详情: This is not a tunic, unless you wear over high wasted pants the slits show the skin on the side of your body. Also very boxy. Only good thing is the weight of material. Just a horrible sweater!
Love how it feels and not too heavyweight. Great color and look.
This sweater is so soft!
Not a bad fit but by no means a sweater look as pictured.  It’s a sweatshirt with a collar
Love, love, love this sweater. Light to midweight, super comfortable. Can easily be dressed up or down, will be buying more colors!
Buy it, buy it now! Lol Probably one of my most worn tops.  So soft and cozy! I have multiples because I want to wear all the time lol
This is not white. It's more of a cream color or off-white. Very disappointing.
I wanted this one because it said it was "chunky" - it is not chunky at all.  Very thin actually so if you want it thin than you're good.

Super disappointed! I ordered the dark apricot color and I got a nude colored shirt! The color looks horrible on my skin tone. I’m super upset because the material feels really nice and cozy and it fits well. Will unfortunately have to return. I would try to get a darker color, but I’m not sure if that will be correct either.
My delivery arrived before the expected date. I love it. Will buy again. Soft and comfortable. Will recommend 👌

I love the sweater. It’s my go to after work sweater every day… I have ordered three colors and gifted this  sweater to my sister and my mother. I ordered a medium and I’m 5 foot 6, 140 lbs. it washes up well and shrinks a little bit in the dryer, but not much in fact, most time I just air dry it. You will love it!!

I was initially really happy with this sweater. The fabric was incredibly soft and comfortable right out of the packaging, and I was excited to wear it. However, after just one wear and a single wash (following the care instructions), the yarn started to fall apart. The quality didn’t hold up at all, which is disappointing considering how great it felt at first. I really wanted to love this sweater, but unfortunately, it doesn’t seem durable enough to last. Wouldn’t recommend it unless you're okay with it being more of a one-time wear item.
Love this sweater.  I use it for so many situations.  Dress it up, dress down.  Material is fabulous.  Washed it many times.  Color has held strong, and didn’t shrink.  Will purchase another one.
It’s quite boxy. Not flatering.
I love the material.
I love this sweater. Great for lounging and dressing up a bit. The quality is impressive!

评论概述: Hate that I didn't love it
评论详情: I was so excited to get this sweater, but sadly was disappointed. The overall fit was just messy, and not in a cute undone/relaxed way. The collar sat crooked. Honestly, it just looked like a poorly cut oversized sweater. I LOVE big sweaters, but they still need to fit a certain way in the right places and the collar needs to be crisper to keep it from looking extremely cheap. Sad I didn't like it.
This is casual and comfortable sweater. It’s a boxy oversized sweater. The blue is a very nice color.

评论概述: Great for a disposable, one time wear.
评论详情: Loved this sweater when received.  But after an 8 hour single wear, it is already pilling at arms and on front.  So, if you are looking for a sweater to wear once, this is the one for you….Complete waste of money.  I cannot recommend and do be influenced like I was to purchase :(
This is a cozy knight. It also has some style and doesn’t look like a sack. Great for work or casual events.
Oh man.  I love this sweater. I need to order more. So comfortable and goes great with a pair of leggings.
soooo big! I missed the return date so I donated it. It was soft and I’m sure is very cute! I got a medium and it was gigantic!! I might buy it again when I can afford to buy more clothes!

The material is soft and cozy but the fit is way too oversized. I am a small in most tops but this sweater is oversized to the point it’s not very flattering. I decided to keep it since the color and material are so nice and I got on deal for $11.99. If I had paid regular price I definitely would’ve returned due to the fit. If you like and prefer oversized this would be a good option for you.

Soft and comfy. Maybe I should have sized down -- I did want it oversized, but it's pretty baggy/frumpy in the shoulders. I probably won't wear it to work as I had planned (maybe on a Friday, lol) but it will be great for WFH days.
If you like big and oversided this is the sweater for you! I could wear this as a dress and be okay! I am 5'2 and 145pounds.
Soft, warm but breathable and comfortable. Oversized without filling frumpy.
It’s very comfortable to wear.
Purchased this sweater for work use. I would love to rate it a 5 star but after wearing it once and washing it, the sweater had a hole.
Great quality, very comfortable a great staple piece to have during the winter months
I love it.  great length.  Very comfortable and can wear it to work or out with jeans

评论概述: Love the softness of the knit
评论详情: Great color and fit was perfect
I'm currently obsessed with tops with collars at the moment.  I think this top is so flattering and true to size.  Very good quality and so so comfortable.  And BONUS - can dress up or dress down!

I do recommend the sweater it’s lovely
LOVE these sweaters - I have 5! They do come vacuum sealed so wrinkled but it comes out. Lightweight- good for southern days and nights.
Dress up or down, I’m heavy chested and love this top!! Very comfortable!
Length of sweater depicted is misleading.  It only hangs to my natural waist where as the picture shows it down to mid thigh.
Bought on sale only to realized I should have sized down at least one. Will wait for the next time, and repurchase! Super soft and heavy weight
Very soft - not very flattering if you’re chesty
This sweater is so soft and well-made…I ordered my normal size Medium and it is oversized as far as length, but looks cute with a half tuck. I would order again and will order in different colors!
Absolutely love this sweater. Wore the green one I ordered for the first time today and have a just ordered it in purple now too!
Love this sweater! Quality is much better than I anticipated. I'm usually between a Small and Medium, bought the Small and it fits just a little oversized, which is exactly what I wanted.

This sweater is a good mid weight fabric. It’s a little boxy but hangs well. Works great with leggings. Description of oversized is accurate. I am wearing a large and like the sleeves cuffed. I am 5’2” and it hits me mid thigh.

I bought two if these and I like the styling and the color and have worn it with skirts and leggings, but it is pilling badly. First wearing it started piling under the arms and along the arm seams where they rub against the body of the sweater, then the rest of it started looking the same and I no longer wear it to work. It's a lot of money for mediocre quality.

This is so pretty, soft, comfortable and durable. Love the stylish collar and V neck. It’s oversized and extremely attractive. I washed it the cold delicate cycle and hanged to dry. I used a clothes shaver to remove any lint or pilling. This Wine/Burgundy color is very fashionable. Will buy more for gift giving. Highly recommend the seller! 👍
nicely made, comfy and versatile
Light weight and comfortable, great fabric.

The description is accurate. It is slightly oversized and can be worn dressed up or down. The material washed well and is softer than expected. Only complaint is the original one that arrived was tried on and returned and sold to me. Quickly got a replacement.
Love this sweater. Such great material a little oversized so order accordingly.

I'm not sure I'd use "sexy" to describe this sweater because I wear it for work all the time. The v-neck isn't too revealing at all on me. I like that it gives me a professional appearance on video calls without sacrificing comfort. I can also dress it up with slacks or down with jeans.
Overall like it. The knit is thinner than I expected, looked thicker in the pics. Very comfortable and I just layered a tank under it.

Got this shirt in and it was so soft and immediately had to put it on. I am exchanging it for a small. I am a medium normally even in oversized shirt. But this shirt was extremely large. Size down for sure!

评论概述: Love. Tad longer would be better.
评论详情: Soft and cozy. True lightweight sweater. True to size. Not as long as it appears in the photos hence the 4 stars but overall great! JUST covers the butt!  I just ordered another one.
There was nothing I liked.

I have so many sweaters, and this is my new favorite.  It's so soft and looks like it would cost much more than I paid. As soon as I tried on my first one I came back to Amazon and ordered another. Get one! You won't regret it.

I ordered this from an influencer LTK. It was definitely cute on her but in real life not so much. It  fit huge and not flattering. She wore a jean jacket it over it and there’s no way that would fit well as bulky as it was. And I ordered a small.

Just the right amount of thickness kept me warm in a very cold day but can literally where it must seasons. I love this shirt it is so flattering.  I wanted it to be a tad tom boy meets feminine. It was just that. Love it!
I understand this is oversized, and I do love the softness of this top, but it was so big and unflattering. I had to return it even though I loved the softness.
Lovely color and very nice soft knit.  Drapes well.  Oversized but looks cute with leggings.

This was a really nice sweater. The material was soft and stretchy and the green color was pretty. I returned it because it was very short. I bought size XL and it didn’t look oversized and long like the picture.
The color apricot is more of a pink than a beige like what is pictured. Other than that the shirt is fine.
After one wear it ripped the seam in the arm, too bad I loved it
Liked it so much I bought another one in a beautiful orange/red color!
The color listed as apricot is really beige. It’s also made from kind of a shiny yarn and creases look Like they’ll never come out. Returned.

The colors in these sweaters are beautiful and are actually better than pictured in person. They are extremely soft too. Unfortunately they are very oversized (and are advertised as such), and I will be returning because they are just too big.
I love this too. It is soft and fits me well. I am going to look for it in another color.
Nice quality sweater but sizes run large. I usual wear an XL to fit comfortable around my hips. A Large fit perfect
I love the v-neck, collared style. Needs to be longer. It’s depicted as tunic length in the photo ( it’s not.) Would be nice to offer in extended sizes as well.
I love this sweater. It is very soft and loose fitting. Size down if you like a form fitting look, but I like the fullness, especially with leggings or a pencil skirt.

评论概述: Cute, cozy, soft and oversized sweater
评论详情: I bought this in the Medium, I am normally a medium or large. It is generously sized. If you are of average height, it can be worn with leggings and it will cover your butt. I like the side slids and the fabric is not overly hot (unlike acrylic or polyester).  Very versatyle piece. I'll probably order in another color.
I bought this in black and in tan. True to size, soft and comfortable.
So happy with this sweater. Great quality and looks great after washing and drying))
Love the weight of this sweater  Color is perfect. Size is oversized. I normally wear xl or xxl but got large and it is plenty big for me.

Super soft high quality material. This shirt is definitely oversized and looks great tucked or with leggings. The v neckline is big but I usually wear a sports bra or bralette under so not a big deal to me. I styled this with high waisted jeans and Uggs for the perfect errand outfit!

I was so skeptical about buying this shirt. I read the reviews and figured I would take a chance. So glad I did! This sweater is so very soft. I ordered an extra large because I like oversized sweaters. I am 5’ 1” and weigh 170 lbs. I have a large bust and round around the hips.  This shirt fit perfectly!  This shirt is not thin but not heavy either. I am ordering other colors!

I do like the texture of this sweater, it’s quite soft. I’ve washed it three times since it arrived but the fabric is still fairly stiff in the shoulder and arm areas, which gives my frame an odd look. I do like the collar, however I wish the V shape cut a bit lower. It hits directly in between my collar bones and sternum. A bit too modest for my liking.
Fit perfectly
This sweater is so soft.  The fit is great and extremely comfortable.  I love it.
Medium was bigger than large . Quality was good but did t look good on.
This sweater is so soft and easy to wear. The color is spot on. I will order more.
The model shown in this sweater it appears to be long but it is not. I was impressed with the quality of material and the style but the length was just too short for me.
Super cute with jeans. Oversized and good quality. Does get softer after washing.
Nice and casual, fits nice and roomy like I like it.
The quality on this sweater is excellent! I've washed it many times and it's holding up great. I love the oversized fit. I would highly recommend this sweater!
Was super excited at how good the quality of this sweater was. I’m a size 12 and the XL is the perfect size.
White is not as pictured, not a true white.  It's definitely off white, almost a cream color so if you are looking for a true, bright white, pass on this sweater.
This sweatshirt is horrific. Choose another option.
Sweater wears like a tent.
Beautiful, exceeded my expectations!  Excellent quality fit and feel.  Now I want one in every color.
